```{r setup}
library(SHPcrownsfile)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)


old_shp <- read_sf(system.file("gpkg/old_version.gpkg", package = 'SHPcrownsfile'))
new_shp <- read_sf(system.file("gpkg/gpkg_from_tablet.gpkg", package = 'SHPcrownsfile'))

# Le crs doit Ãªtre en UTM
```
